abs: An ordinal and binary regression model with parametric link is introduced. The link is a member of a one-parameter family of “mixture links”, a family that comprises smooth mixtures of the extreme minimum-value, extreme maximum-value, and logistic distributions. A Bayesian version of this flexible model serves as a vehicle for introducing a priori information regarding the choice of link. Owing to non-conjugacy, posterior and predictive distributions are approximated using Markov chain Monte Carlo simulation methods. Link-independent, Bayesian interpretations of covariate effects are described. The method is illustrated through the analyses of several data sets.
title: Bayesian ordinal and binary regression models with a parametric family of mixture links
